args.subject: Invoice for TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse Purchase
args.body:
Hi Alice,

I've reordered the same TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse that I purchased previously, using my available discount. The platform has sent the official invoice to my email, so I'm forwarding you the purchase details below:

Item: TechBrand Precision Wireless Mouse
Quantity: 1
Order ID: ORDER-530940
Order Date: 2024-05-19
Total Paid (after discount): $162.00

If you need the formal PDF invoice, let me know and I can forward it from my inbox.

Best,
Emma Johnson
Blue Sparrow Tech

content.content: The email has been sent successfully.
